description:
In love the most important thing is confidence. Show that you are a seducer and win the heart of the boy of your dreams. Don't lie! If you fail he will know it and you won't conquer his love.

Features:

- As you advance the questions start to get more personal.
- More than 20 different questions.
- Different endings depending on how many questions you answer.
- Open chests to unlock images of the boys on the beach.
- Unveil the secret and spicy question that they will ask you in question 150.

Remember not to lie! Prove your ability to win a boy's heart.
name: Beach Boys: The Perfect Date
intro: Lying is not the best way to win a boy's heart. So behave well and be sincere as well as quick in giving your answers.
